title: iPod.Touch.1G_3.0.firmware.update -Ibanez
description:
This is the latest 3.0 firmware/software/OS for your iPod Touch 1G.

It is the original update from apple, and can be jailbroken with redsn0w.

MD5 = AB2054FB29B2F67168B960E64C852295

___________________________________________________________


HOW TO:

1. Connect your iPod Touch 1G to computer.
2. Start iTunes 8.2 & Select iPod Touch from devices list.
3. Windows: Hold Shift down while clicking on 'Restore'
   Mac: Hold down Option key while clicking on 'Restore'
4. Locate the iPod Touch ipsw file, you just have downloaded
5. Do not disconnect till iTunes has completed updating iPod Touch

Thats it, now enjoy your iPod Touch 3.0 Firmware.

**Click on 'Check for update' after installing 3.0, to have the latest update**

Remember, this is only for iPod touch 1G!

3.0 firmware for iPod Touch 2G:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4961913/iPod.Touch.2G_3.0.firmware.update
